# Case study using HMP data: Buccal Mucosa and Tongue Dorsum
This tutorial is aimed at showing researchers how to conduct different comparative metagenomic analyses. The methods shown here are shown in the book chapter:
**Comparative Metagenomics**, part of Comparative Genomics, Methods in Molecular Biology edited by Setubal, Stadler, Stoye. 2016. 

Contributors:
- Andrew Maltez Thomas
- Felipe Prata Silva
- Livia Moura
